channel.title: Can't get client to even load!
channel.description:
Okay, I can't get the verson 4.0 to even load. Here's what I tried so far. I deleted all cache for mopar! I cleaned out all other servers. I try loading 4.0 and get the follow errors.
Downloading C:\Users\****/.moparscape/backgrounds/www.moparisthebest.com.bgs.background6.jpg... C:\Users\****/.moparscape/backgrounds/www.moparisthebest.com.bgs.background6.jpg downloaded... Could not open Server on port 0 Could not open Server on port 0
Note: I changed server this is what I get. I also get this connection problem - Will Retry In (Seconds). Someone Please Help Me!

item.title: Can't get client to even load!

item.description:
@killerkody wrote:

Yes, I think. I’m using the client on there site version 4.0 there is a link above of what im using.
